$:/plugins/xp/splashscreen/readme.title: $:/plugins/xp/splashscreen/readme
$:/plugins/xp/splashscreen/readme.text:
; Splash Screen
: 快速切换「启动画面」。

!! Settings

{{$:/plugins/xp/splashscreen/settings}}

!! See also

* [[SpinKit|https://github.com/tobiasahlin/SpinKit]]
* [[Three Dots|https://nzbin.github.io/three-dots/#]]
* [[HTML5+CSS3 最酷的 loading 效果收集|https://www.runoob.com/w3cnote/free-html5-css3-loaders-preloaders.html]]
* [[CSS3 Loading Animation|https://codepen.io/TaniaLD/pen/oKxep]]

$:/plugins/xp/splashscreen/settings.title: $:/plugins/xp/splashscreen/settings
$:/plugins/xp/splashscreen/settings.caption: Splash Screen
$:/plugins/xp/splashscreen/settings.text:
\define selectSplashScreen() <$select tiddler='$:/SplashScreen'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/SplashScreen]]'> \end
<$checkbox tiddler="$:/SplashScreen" tag="$:/tags/RawMarkupWikified/TopBody"> Change splashscreen: <>
> See also: $:/SplashScreen
